author.persName: Muhammad Karim b. Mahdi Quli Sarabi Tabrizi.

msItem.title: Farhang-i Muhammad Shahi.
msItem.note: F1a: Printed bookplate of Sani' al-Daula Muhammad Hasan Khan dated 1298. Later entitled I'timad al-Saltana he was one of Nasir al-Din Shah's ministers. On the bookplate the signature of Ellis. Front flyleaf, verso: account in siyaq. Under end of text: impression of rectangular seal of 'Abd al-Rahim. After text several folios with ruled margins, some coloured. These and the flyleaves have bits of poetry etc written on them. A Persian dictionary, written at the suggestion of Prince Bahman Mirza for presentation to his brother, the future Muhammad Shah. Ruled and gilded margins. Headings and punctuation in red.

listBibl.bibl: Storey list no other MS; a later version, the Burhan-i Jami' is more common.

handNote.desc: Nasta'liq. with headwords in naskh; in the latter part all naskh.

bindingDesc.p: Brown leather binding, presumably Persian, with coloured stamped decoration

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
